casebody.data:
No. 10-8170. Curtis Matthews, Petitioner v. United States. 562 U.S. 1250, 131 S. Ct. 1516,

179 L. Ed. 2d 361,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1138. February 22, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of *362Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 622 F.3d 99.
